title: Four people rescued after boat overturns south of the Bay Bridge
body: ANNE ARUNDEL COUNTY, Md. — Four people were rescued from the water after their boat capsized about half-a-mile away from the Bay Bridge Thursday night.According to Anne Arundel County Fire officials, the call came in just before 9 p.m.Initially it was believed three people were still in the water, but a Good Samaritan had already helped get them on another boat.A fourth person was still missing and later located by a Natural Resources Police diver around the cabin of the overturned boat.He was taken to Sandy Point and then flown to Shock Trauma by helicopter with potential hypothermia. The other three people rescued refused medical attention.
